short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inspired with motivational and inspirational quotes every time you open a new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The InspireWave extension aims to provide users with a daily dose of motivation and inspiration. When you open a new tab in your browser, this extension greets you with uplifting quotes that can help boost your mood and mindset. Whether you’re starting your workday or taking a break, these motivational snippets serve as a positive reminder to stay focused, resilient, and inspired. Remember, a single quote can have a profound impact on someone’s day. May your extension bring joy and encouragement to all who encounter it.
